description: An indepth view at each indivudial node

targets.query: SELECT max("response_result_data_Pool_info_Total_nodes_count") - max("response_result_data_Pool_info_f_value") FROM "node" WHERE ("network"::tag =~ /^$network$/ AND "name"::tag =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("status_errors") FROM "node" WHERE ("network"::tag =~ /^$network$/ AND "name"::tag =~ /^$node$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "status_ok" and
    r.name == "${node}" and
    r.network == "${network}"
  )
  |> yield()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>

    r.name == "${node}" and
    r.network == "${network}"

  |> yield()

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) =>
    r._measurement == "node" and 
    r._field == "response_result_data_Pool_info_Quorums" and
    r.name == "${node}" and
    r.network == "${network}"
  )
  |> yield()

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node" WITH KEY = "network"
list.label: Network
list.name: network

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node" WITH KEY = "network"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "network" = '${network}'
list.label: Node
list.name: node

query.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "node" WITH KEY = "name" WHERE "network" = '${network}'

title: Node Detail
